[[Hinata]] poses with her arms defensively, via being a counter/reversal. Upon the opponent hitting her, she then grabs the opponent and sends them flying away straight up into the air with an arm-waving flourish. She then strikes her falling foe with a powerful hit with her palm.

== Trivia ==
*The term "aiki" is derived from the term "aikidō", a form of Japanese martial arts that revolves around grappling techniques.
